docs: Shares chunks 0-2

instructions.name: share_chunks_3_5

instructions.name: share_chunks_6_8

instructions.name: share_data_meta_callback
docs: MEMORY OPTIMIZATION: 6 split callbacks, each handles ≤3 outputs
This keeps each callback's stack under 4KB (vs 57KB before)

instructions.name: share_meta
docs: Shares metadata fields (data_id, data_type, owner_id)
MEMORY OPTIMIZATION: Split into 6 operations with ≤3 outputs each

instructions.name: share_metadata
docs: Shares metadata field

instructions.name: store_confidential_data
docs: Stores encrypted confidential data on-chain.
This function allows users to store any type of confidential data in encrypted form.
All data fields are encrypted 32-byte arrays that can only be decrypted by authorized parties.
Supports up to 10 data chunks for flexible data storage (documents, messages, files, etc.).
# Arguments
* `data_id` - Encrypted unique identifier for this data
* `data_type` - Encrypted data type indicator (1=document, 2=message, 3=file, etc.)
* `owner_id` - Encrypted owner identifier
* `metadata` - Encrypted metadata (timestamp, size, etc.)
* `data_chunks` - Array of encrypted data chunks (up to 10)

types.name: ClockAccount
docs: An account storing the current network epoch

types.name: ComputationDefinitionAccount
docs: An account representing a [ComputationDefinition] in a MXE.

types.name: ComputationDefinitionMeta
docs: A computation definition for execution in a MXE.

types.name: ComputationSignature
docs: The signature of a computation defined in a [ComputationDefinition].

types.name: ConfidentialData
docs: Stores encrypted confidential data.
Supports any type of data through flexible chunk-based storage.

fields.name: owner
docs: Original owner's public key

fields.name: data_id
docs: Encrypted unique data identifier

fields.name: data_type
docs: Encrypted data type (document, message, file, etc.)

fields.name: owner_id
docs: Encrypted owner identifier

fields.name: metadata
docs: Encrypted metadata (timestamp, size, description)

fields.name: data_chunks
docs: Array of encrypted data chunks (flexible storage)

types.name: Epoch
docs: The network epoch

types.name: MXEAccount
docs: A MPC Execution Environment.

types.name: NodeRef
docs: A reference to a node in the cluster.
The offset is to derive the Node Account.
The current_total_rewards is the total rewards the node has received so far in the current
epoch.

types.name: Output
docs: An output of a computation.
We currently don't support encrypted outputs yet since encrypted values are passed via
data objects.

types.name: Parameter
docs: A parameter of a computation.
We differentiate between plaintext and encrypted parameters and data objects.
Plaintext parameters are directly provided as their value.
Encrypted parameters are provided as an offchain reference to the data.
Data objects are provided as a reference to the data object account.

types.name: ReceivedDataEvent
docs: Legacy event (kept for backward compatibility, but prefer ShareCompletedEvent)

types.name: ShareCompletedEvent
docs: Minimal event emitted when sharing completes.
Contains only references, not full data (memory optimization).

fields.name: storage_pubkey
docs: PDA where re-encrypted data is stored

fields.name: receiver
docs: Receiver's public key

fields.name: original_owner
docs: Original owner's public key

types.name: ShareDataChunk9Output
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: SharedDataStorage
docs: Stores re-encrypted data for a specific receiver.
Created when data is shared via MPC re-encryption.
